item.title: centos 下磁盘热扩容
item.description: 配置 yum 源,安装 growpart 工具 1 2 3 4 5 curl -o /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo http://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/Centos-7.repo curl -o /etc/yum.repos.d/epel.repo http://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/epel-7.repo sed -i -e '/mirrors.cloud.aliyuncs.com/d' -e '/mirrors.aliyuncs.com/d' /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo yum search growpart yum install cloud-utils-growpart.x86_64 使用 growpart 进行硬盘分区表可用空间的扩展 1 2 lsblk -p growpart /dev/sda 2 LVM 分区与文件系统扩展

item.title: linux 环境
item.description: 翻墙 ssh 1 sudo ssh -qTfnN -D 8087 user@remote-hosts 上面的 8087 是本地未被占用的端口，可以自己选择。其它参数的意思是： -q :- be very quite, we are acting only as a tunnel. -T :- Do not allocate a pseudo tty, we are only acting a tunnel. -f :- move
